Reviews.Title: “great!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!”

Reviews.Content: im student happened travel lot stayed nice cousy hotel month march stay rome highlight trip europe accomodation nice home staff nice helpful plus tips move rome conveniently position hotel convinient near terminal station late chance hotel nice neat breakfast sufficient suggest hotel traveler stay rome ill chance

Reviews.Title: “It's worst hotel I'd ever see”
Reviews.Author: julianakiseleva
Reviews.Content: honey moon rome 12 days stayed 3 hotels 1 des artistes perfect nice staff breakfast 2 okey staff friendly dont speak english breakfast 3 awful mean decide own didnt bring glasses shampoo soap reception cleaning brought towel breakfast veryvery bad coffee bad croissant book hotel voucher pay people 100 euros instead 70 site argue threaten police day rome flight money provide service advice stay hotel im disappointed screwed day honey moon
